page.title: 03The Vicar of Keyham
page.content: {Canon Philip Davidson}is the Rector of the villages of{Houghton on the {Hill}and{Keyham.}He has looked after the parish since 1981. A typical Sunday for Canon Davidson starts when he gets up at 6.45 am. At 7.30 he takes{Morning Prayers}in Houghton Church - he must do this every day whether or not anyone attends. At 8.00 he takes{Holy Communion}at Houghton and has breakfast at 8.45. At 9.30 he holds{Matins}at Keyham Church. There are no hymns as there is no organist in the village. At 10.30 it is time for{Family Eucharist at Houghton. After the service Canon Davidson takes communion to the sick and disabled in the village. His morning finishes at 12.00. Finally he takes{Evensong}at Houghton at 6.00 pm.
